target.description: An expression that must return the entity to chase after. If multiple entities are returned, the first one will be selected.

speedX.description: Amount of pixels the x coordinate must be increased when the target entity moves along the x axis.

speedY.description: Amount of pixels the y coordinate must be increased when the target entity moves along the y axis.

description: Makes the visibility of the parent entity depend on a given condition. When the condition is evaluated to true, the entity will be shown in screen and touchable.
